cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.condition.base

Class Condition.Entry

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.condition.base.Condition.Entry
  • Enclosing class:
    Condition

    public static class Condition.Entry
extends java.lang.Object
    Condition basic entity. Can be converted to a condition string when execute a DB query.
